title: [综合]Xhub —— 多功能、多趣味、可GUI配置的群组大厅[1.7.X-1.8.X]
author: KagariAtsuko
txt_content:
本帖最后由 KagariAtsuko 于 2018-8-7 14:08 编辑 

关于本插件2018.8.7已更新

XHub提供了更简单更先进的群组大厅的配置方式
XHub面向HCF、KITMAP，但实际上可以在任何情况下使用
最主要的是这个插件部分GUI配置却100%免费
DEPENDENCIES前置插件说明Vault (Required)Permissions Plugin (Required)BungeeCord (Required)EzQueue (可以不用，但是要在Config.yml中移除"EZQUEUE_NAME"字段).

作者Alejandro12120（主要）、Harpy（计分板）
原帖地址和下载地址都在上方简介栏中


指令列表

/xhub info (No permission) 显示XHub的基本信息
/xhub reload (hub.reload) 重载Xhub
/clearchat (hub.clearchat) 清除所在大厅内所有对话
/mutechat (hub.mutechat) 禁止所在大厅内所有对话
/config (hub.config) 打开配置页面
/vanish (hub.vanish) 大厅内隐身
/skull (hub.skull) 获取头颅


配置文件

Config.yml
Config:
    spawn:
        x: 0
        y: 100
        z: 0
        world: world
    armor:
        helmet: LEATHER_HELMET
        chestplate: LEATHER_CHESTPLATE
        leggings: LEATHER_LEGGINGS
        boots: LEATHER_BOOTS
    double-jump:
        enable: true
        sound: BLAZE_HIT
    blockbreaks-protector:
        enabled: true
        message: "&cYou can not break blocks."
    blockplaces-protector:
        enabled: true
        message: "&cYou can not place blocks."
    speed:
        enabled: true
        level: 4
    ingame-config:
        enabled: true
    void-teleport:
        enabled: true
        teleport-on: 10
    height-limit:
        enabled: true
        limit: 140
    items:
        enderbutt:
            name: "&fEnder Butt"
            slot: 0
            amount: 32
        book:
            name: "&9In game configuration"
            slot: 8
            command: "config"
        selector:
            name: "&6Server Selector"
            title: "&9Servers:"
            slot: 4
            id: COMPASS
            data: 0
            gui-size: 27
            servers:
                HCF:
                    name: "&aHCF"
                    id: ENDER_PEARL
                    data: 0
                    slot: 13
                    max-players: 100
                    lore:
                       - "&7&m                                  "
                        - "&eStatus: <status>"
                        - "&ePlayers: &7<online>/100"
                        - "&7&m                                  "
                    EZQUEUE_NAME: "HCF"
                    BUNGEE_NAME: "HCF"
复制代码


Messages.yml

#Thanks for download my plugin :D
#Change the message when a player join the server.
#For nothing leave it by default.
join-message:
   - ""
#Change the message when a player leave  the server.
#For nothing leave it by default.
quit-message:
   - ""
#The welcome message every player gets when they join/rejoin the server.
#This can contains server information.
special-join-message:
   - "&7&m                                                                "
    - "&3&lWelcome to the &9&lXHub lobby&3&l."
    - "&7"
    - "   &bThis plugin uses &9XHub!"
    - "   &3You can download it on: &ahttps://www.spigotmc.org/resources"
    - "   &b&lIts &a&lFREE"
    - "&7"
    - "&b&lYou are currently connected to &9&lHub&b&l."
    - "&7&m                                                                "
#This message send to all player when the clearchat finish.
#For nothing leave blank.
chat-clear-final-message: "&b&lChat has been cleared by &3&l<player>&b&l."
#This message send to player when dont have the specific permission.
no-permission: "&cIm sorry but you do not have permission to perform this command. Please contact the server administrator if you believe that this is in error."
#This message send to all players when the chat is muted.
mute-chat-message: "&cChat has been muted, by <player>."
#This message send to all players when the chat is unmuted.
unmute-chat-message: "&aChat has been unmuted, by <player>."
#This message send to the player when he is trying to speak when the chat is muted.
chat-muted-message: "&cThe chat is muted, you can not speak."
#This message send to the player when he reload the config.
config-reload: "&fmessages.yml - config.yml &ahas been reloaded"
#This message send to the player when he set the spawn (/config).
spawn-set: "&aSpawn set successfull."
#This message send to the player when the ingame configuration is disabled.
ingame-config-disabled: "&cThe ingame configuration &7&o(/config) &cis disabled in the config.yml"
#This message send to the player when he click on the configs.
ingame-config-change: "&aSuccessfully change to <config> config."
#This message send to the player when he reload the messages.yml
ingame-reload-messages: "&fmessages.yml &ahas been reloaded."
#This message send to the player when he reload the config.yml
ingame-reload-config: "&fconfig.yml &ahas been reloaded."
#This message send to the player when he enable the vanish.
vanish-enable: "&9Vanish &aenabled."
#This message send to the player when he disable the vanish.
vanish-disable: "&9Vanish &cdisabled."
#This message send to the player when he enable the fly.
fly-enable: "&9Fly &aenabled."
#This message send to the player when he disable the fly.
fly-disable: "&9Fly &cdisabled."
复制代码


Scoreboard.yml

default:
    enable: true
    title: "&9xHub &c[Lobby]"
    lines:
       - "<line>"
        - "&fOnline &8? &9<online>"
        - " "
        - "&fName &8? &9<name>"
        - "&fRank &8? &9<rank>"
        - " "
        - "&9southcf.us"
        - "<line>"
复制代码

因为我个人喜欢英文...
所以没有做汉化，如果哪个腐竹大佬想要汉化的话我可以做sa

replies.txt_content: 我要，麻烦你汉化一下哦，谢谢
